#include <iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<map>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;

int main() 
{
	int t,n,m,s,p,q,x,count,y,s1,s2;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	    count=0,x=1,y=1;
		cin>>n>>m>>s>>p>>q;
		vector<int >v1,v2;
		vector<int>::iterator it;
	s1=s2=s;
	    while(x+p<m)
	    {
	    	x=x+p;
	    	v1.push_back(x);
	    	s1--;
	    }
	     while(y+q<m)
	    {
	    	y=y+q;
	    	v2.push_back(y);
	    	s2--;
	    }
	    //for v1
	    //x=(x+p)%m;
	    //y=(y+q)%m;
	    
		while(s1--)
	    {
	    	x=(x+p)%(n-m+1);
	      	v1.push_back(x);
	    }
	    	while(s2--)
	    {
	    	y=(y+q)%(n-m+1);
	    	v2.push_back(y);
	   
	    	
	    }
	    
/*2 3
3 2
0 4
1 1
2 3
3 0
4 2
0 4
1 1
2 3*/
	    for(int i=0;i<s;i++)
	    {
	    	if(v1[i]==v2[i])
	    	count++;
	    }
	/*    for(int i=0;i<s;i++)
	    {
	    	cout<<v1[i]<<" "<<v2[i]<<endl;
	    }*/
	/*    2 3
3 1
2 0
0 2
1 1
2 0
0 2
1 1
2 0
0 2*/
	    
	   cout<<count<<endl;
	}
	
	return 0;
}
